thread.title: Whack: Blues hit Tigers with banner banter
thread.title_full: Whack: Blues hit Tigers with banner banter

title: Whack: Blues hit Tigers with banner banter
text:
Carlton hits Richmond with banner banter with hilarious pre-game message ahead of Round 1 match March 23, 2017 7:30pm Source: FOX SPORTS WE thought teams would borrow from the Western Bulldogs in 2017, but this is one step further. 
The reigning premiers were also the premiers of banners last season with comedian Danny McGinlay writing the words which poked fun at the Dogs’ opponents, home cities and tax brackets. 
So on the opening night of season 2017 it was Carlton who laid the first hit, but more mentally than physically. 
The Blues’ banner banter combined a slam of the Tigers’ list management with a whack on Dustin Martin’s haircut. 
“Richmond’s five year plan has become a disaster,” it read. 
“The vision impaired like Dusty’s barber!” 
It didn’t seem to have too much impact though with Richmond producing a fast start once the real action got underway.
